body: "Préval, who will complete his mandate which runs from 2006 to 2011, has betrayed the aspirations of the Haitian people. Now he organizes the return of a dictator who should be judged for his crimes": The Haitian Blogger translates a French blog post that opines about the return of Duvalier to Haiti.
original_body: "Préval, who will complete his mandate which runs from 2006 to 2011, has betrayed the aspirations of the Haitian people. Now he organizes the return of a dictator who should be judged for his crimes": The Haitian Blogger translates a French blog post that opines about the return of Duvalier to Haiti.
title: Haiti: About "Baby Doc"
